caption.p: The specific leaf area (SLA, m 2 g −1), root-shoot ratio (R:S) and leaf chlorophyll concentration (Chl, a unitless index from 0 to 100) of the three species under nitrogen treatments. Species: G, Galinsoga quadriradiata; H, Heteropappus hispidus; S, Sonchus oleraceus. Values are means ± SE. Means with the same letter were not significantly different at an alpha level of 0.05.
